5332: 
5333: For $\sigma'(V) = \sqrt{V + c^2}$ where $c = \eta_{\min} > 0$ and $V \in C^m$ with $\|\nabla^k V\| \leq M_k$, the $m$-th derivative satisfies:
5334: 
5335: $$
5336: \|\nabla^m \sigma'(V)\| \leq C_{\sigma,m} \cdot m!
5337: 
5338: $$
